title: 193 - When is Theological Gatekeeping Okay?
description:
Mike responds to a tweet claiming one does not have to believe in the actual, physical Resurrection of Jesus to be a Christian. When is 'Gatekeeping' ok amongst those who claim the name of 'Cristian?' And how might that be done?

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
